RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERENDIPITOUS dueled on the early lead, shook clear in the stretch and widened late under steady handling. VICTORY DIVISION contended throughout, could not gain late on the winner but was second best. ACCURATE never far back while three wide, lacked a late kick. COUNTRY RUCKUS dueled with the winner, weakened in the stretch and bled. WHISKEY HELPS was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GO GIRL was away alertly and quickly made the lead, repulsed a bid at the quarter pole, drew off in the stretch under strong handling to win going away.. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN chased the winner early, rallied at the quarter pole and drew close, was no match late but was clearly second best. MY TWO JAKES tracked three wide and was no menace late. MISS IRISH ZIP contended early was was through after a half. SWEET RED ROZAY was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 25900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY BALL dueled early, shook clear on the turn, remained clear in the stretch under firm handling. LITTLE BLAKER chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but was second best. ROSCO P. COLTRANE had good position on the inside, angled out in the stretch three wide and went evenly late. GALACTIC tracked three wide early, angled in stretch and was no threat late. PAT'S KARMA was no factor.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEEKENDING set the early pace and dueled on the lead, was hooked at the quarter pole, battled through the stretch and prevailed after a long drive. TITEBLUEJEANS pressed the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, battled through the stretch and just missed. FABULOUS CLOWN had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole three wide and drew close, needed more late. PUNCHCORN broke slowly and trailed, stopped late.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 6. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHOW SLIDING HOME chased early, rallied at the quarter pole and gained a slight lead, battled through the stretch and prevailed late under left handed urging. RONNI'S STORM sec the early pace, was hooked at the quarter pole, held grudgingly after a long battle and just missed. OFTEN ENOUGH was never far back on the inside, rallied on the rail and finished willingly. BUCKEYE RUCKUS had good position early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch and went evenly. JOES A ROCKIN had brief foot and was through early. ONE CRAZY RIDE was outrun. The rider of RONNI'S STROM claimed foul against the rider of SHOW SLIDING HOME for alleged interference in the stretch. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHAT'S SO FUNNY dueled early, shook clear down the backside, widened in the stretch under strong handling. CHORIST was never far back, rallied on the turn three wide, could not gain but was clearly second best. GRAY ROYALITY chased the winner for three quarters, then weakened in the stretch. PHARIBE had good position early and lacked a late response. AUCTION FEVER raced wide early and was no menace. ADMONISH slow early, was outrun. PEACH BELLINI raced mid pack and tired on the far turn.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERO'S DAUGHTER set the early pace and dueled on the lead from the rail, held gamely after a long stretch battle and prevailed. YOUDEVILYOUCECILIA had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, battled gamely in the stretch and just missed. I MATTER raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch three wide and finished willingly. GORILLA GIRL was never far back, saved ground and went evenly. NELL'S BELLS was unhurried early and trailed, closed a gap late while no threat. IRON WILMA chased the winner and weakened in the stretch. SUPER SURGE was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Howard B. Noonan S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 73. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS (OHIO REGISTERED). $50 to nominate. Subscription of $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% to fourth, 3% to fifth and 2% to sixth. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstakes allowed 2 lbs. ; Non-winners of two races, 4 lbs.; Maidens, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, April 3, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEDIA DARLING was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened in the stretch under mild urging to win as much the best. WETZEL chased the winner throughout, was no match late but was second best. NEED TO KNOW BASIS was never far back early, had a mild bid three wide while no threat. CAVALETTO had good position early on the inside and lacked a late response. K KID allowed to settle while four wide, was no threat late. GRAND ISLE saved ground early and was through after a half.
